last_episode_to_air.name: Sing What I Can't Say
last_episode_to_air.overview: A secret is revealed about Bess’ past—and she faces her fears. Season finale.

name: Little Voice
overview: Meet Bess King, a uniquely talented performer struggling to fulfill her dreams while handling rejection, dating drama, and family issues. This is a story about finding your authentic voice—and the courage to use it.

episodes.name: I Don't Know
episodes.overview: Young musician Bess King races from job to job in New York while trying to find the courage to perform her own material.

episodes.name: I Will Survive
episodes.overview: Taking her brother Louie's advice, Bess gets rehired at the club—and her first paying gig thanks to her friend and coworker Benny.

episodes.name: Dear Hope
episodes.overview: Bess tries creating a song about hope for a songwriting competition, but is left reeling by an incident involving her roommate, Prisha.

episodes.name: Love Hurts
episodes.overview: Bess and Samuel are awarded the opportunity to record at legendary Electric Lady Studios—and are joined by Bess’s father, Percy.

episodes.name: Quick, Quick Slow
episodes.overview: When she decides to make a music video, Bess asks Ethan to direct and enlists all of her friends to help make it a DIY masterpiece.

episodes.name: Tell Her
episodes.overview: Ethan's decision to stay with Laila causes Bess to spiral into self-destruction, which has far-reaching consequences.

episodes.name: Ghost Light
episodes.overview: Just as Benny sets up a series of meetings with record executives, Bess experiences a setback.

episodes.name: Sea Change
episodes.overview: With her family in turmoil and romantic life torn, Bess nears a breaking point.

episodes.name: Sing What I Can't Say
episodes.overview: A secret is revealed about Bess’ past—and she faces her fears. Season finale.
